text: Ezɨ Godɨn Duam ko Sipsipɨn Nguzimɨn amuim, aning ghaze, “Ekiam Iesus, nɨ izɨ!” Eghtɨ gumazamizir uaghan akar kam baraghiziba, me uaghan kamaghɨn mɨkɨmam, “Nɨ izɨ!” Eghtɨ gumazitam kuarim an pɨrtɨ, a izɨ. Egh a dɨpam amɨsɨ, dɨpar ikɨrɨmɨrir zurara itim anɨdir kam puram a inigham, iveziba puvatɨ.
